docs.snippet: The Union Corporation estimated this week that the production of gold throughout the world in 1937, including a preliminary figure of 6,000,000 ounces for Russia, was 35,400,000 fine ounces. This is almost 7 1/2 per cent more than the 32,960,000...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Union Corporation estimated this week that the production of gold throughout the world in 1937, including a preliminary figure of 6,000,000 ounces for Russia, was 35,400,000 fine ounces. This is almost 7 1/2 per cent more than the 32,960,000 ounces mined in 1936 and is a new high record for a year.

headline.main: HIGH RECORD MADE IN GOLD PRODUCTION; Last Year's World Output Is Estimated in London at 35,400,000 Ounces UP 7 1/2 PER CENT FROM 1936 Great Britain's Net Imports of the Metal Fell Sharply in 1937 to [Pound]79,563,035

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: Three members of the crew of the American freighter Algic were indicted yesterday by the Federal grand jury in Brooklyn on charges of "endeavoring to make a revolt" while the ship was in the harbor of Montevideo, Uruguay, on Sept. 10.
docs.lead_paragraph: Three members of the crew of the American freighter Algic were indicted yesterday by the Federal grand jury in Brooklyn on charges of "endeavoring to make a revolt" while the ship was in the harbor of Montevideo, Uruguay, on Sept. 10.
docs.abstract: C Lowder, J O Lampkin and R Stewart indicted in Bklyn

docs.snippet: Basketball's boom is not confined to the United States. The rest of the world also is taking up the sport with greater zeal than ever before. The Olympic tournament at Berlin, which found the American teams several years ahead of the other nations,...
docs.lead_paragraph: Basketball's boom is not confined to the United States. The rest of the world also is taking up the sport with greater zeal than ever before. The Olympic tournament at Berlin, which found the American teams several years ahead of the other nations, has been a great spur in the improvement of play of countries all over the globe.
